meta.title: Discord Community | Pledge & Grow
meta.description: Join our Discord community to connect with like-minded professionals, get real-time support, and stay updated on the latest Pledge & Grow events and resources.

hero.title: Join Our Community
hero.description: Connect with like-minded professionals, get real-time support, and stay updated on the latest Pledge & Grow events and resources.

benefits.title: Why Join Our Discord
benefits.description: Our Discord server is more than just a chat platformâ€”it's a vibrant community where you can learn, connect, and grow with fellow professionals.

realTimeSupport.title: Real-time Support
realTimeSupport.description: Get immediate help from our team and community members whenever you need it.

networking.title: Networking Opportunities
networking.description: Connect with industry professionals, potential partners, and like-minded individuals.

liveEvents.title: Live Events
liveEvents.description: Participate in AMAs, webinars, and workshops hosted directly in our Discord server.

voiceChannels.title: Voice Channels
voiceChannels.description: Join voice discussions, collaborative sessions, and community meetings.

exclusiveResources.title: Exclusive Resources
exclusiveResources.description: Access guides, tutorials, and resources shared only with our Discord community.

earlyUpdates.title: Early Updates
earlyUpdates.description: Be the first to know about new features, services, and company announcements.

globalCommunity.title: Global Community
globalCommunity.description: Join a diverse community of professionals from around the world.

safeEnvironment.title: Safe Environment
safeEnvironment.description: Enjoy a moderated space that promotes respectful and productive discussions.

channels.title: Discord Channels
channels.description: Our server is organized into different channels to help you find the information and support you need.

welcome.title: Welcome & Announcements
welcome.description: Get started with our community and stay updated on important announcements.

general.title: General Discussion
general.description: Chat about industry topics, share ideas, and connect with other members.

support.title: Support & Help
support.description: Get assistance with technical issues, product questions, and more.

resources.title: Resources & Learning
resources.description: Access educational content, guides, and learning materials.

events.title: Events & Webinars
events.description: Information about upcoming events, webinars, and community activities.

guidelines.title: Community Guidelines
guidelines.description: To ensure a positive experience for all members, we ask everyone to follow these guidelines:

respect.title: Be Respectful
respect.description: Treat all members with respect and courtesy. Harassment and discrimination are not tolerated.

constructive.title: Be Constructive
constructive.description: Provide helpful feedback and contribute positively to discussions.

ontopic.title: Stay On Topic
ontopic.description: Use channels for their intended purpose to keep discussions organized.

privacy.title: Respect Privacy
privacy.description: Do not share personal information about yourself or others without consent.

cta.title: Ready to Join Our Community?
cta.description: Connect with professionals, get support, and stay updated on the latest developments. Our Discord community is waiting for you!
